import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import baoBanner from '../../assets/img/quic-banner.png' import quicLogo from '../../assets/img/quic-.png' import Button from '../../components/Button' import Container from '../../components/Container' import Page from '../../components/Page' import PageHeader from '../../components/PageHeader' import Spacer from '../../components/Spacer' import Balances from './components/Balances' const Home: React.FC = () => { return ( Be sure to read docs.quic.finance{' '} before using the pools so you are familiar with protocol risks and fees! Please note this is the mainnet version of Quic Finance
üèÜPro Tip: QUIC-ETH UNIV2 has the biggest weight of all pools. Check them here{'.'} üí≤Pro Tip: The affiliate links from the "Buy X" buttons generate revenue for the Bao Treasury which Bao holders own.
Even if you already trade at these exchanges consider creating a new account to help grow the protocol. ‚ùóÔ∏èDisclaimer: Bao is currently in alpha and has a one-person engineering team.
While we are scaling, there may be higher than normal risk of bugs and we may be slower in being able to respond to them.
Please partake accordingly.
The service is provided as-is. ) } const StyledInfo = styled.h3` color: ${(props) => props.theme.color.grey[500]}; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin: 0; padding: 0; text-align: center; > b { color: ${(props) => props.theme.color.grey[600]}; } ` export default Home
